alert.note: Alert for Rockland; Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 3:31PM EDT until September 08 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bergen County in northeastern New Jersey... Southern Westchester County in southeastern New York... Rockland County in southeastern New York... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 331 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tappan, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Tappan and Pearl River around 335 PM EDT. Nanuet around 345 PM EDT. Nyack around 355 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
